landing.cover2: I build things on the Internet
landing.paper1text: Since early May, Ryan has started on developing devrwoo from scratch in both Front End and Back End using React, Redux, Express, MongoDB, and Node.js...
landing.paper3text: devrwoo always try best to develop a website with balanced in both Security and Connectivity
landing.grid2card1text: Blogging website with Authentication. Users can write Posts and Users can comment on any post. Every user has its own profile and users can also see people's recent Github Repos...
landing.grid2card2text: You can access source code for this website at

project.cover: I put effort in every project
project.paper1text: My skills include but not limited to: -HTML -CSS -Javascript - Material UI -React.js -react-router-dom -react-redux -Redux -redux-thunk -Axios -Moment -proxy -Node.js -Express.js -express-validator -Mongoose -jsonWebToken -Bcrypt.js -config -Gravatar -Request and More..
project.paper2text2: [Node & Express.js] Make server.js & init Routes Init Auth Init
project.paper2text3: [Bcrypt.js & jsonWebToken] Authentication route Init Users route Init Profile route
project.paper2text4: [Mongoose & Request] Every Data is stored with MongoDB using Mongoose.
project.paper2text6: [React.js] Initialize React app & dependencies Server with Node.js
project.paper2text7: [Proxy & Axios] Connect & communicate with server using proxy and Axios
project.paper3text2: [React Router] Able to navigate around to separate pages in our app
project.paper3text3: [Google Login] Allow a user to login/logout
project.paper3text4: [Redux] Handle forms like create user, make stream... in Redux.
project.paper3text5: [React-Redux] CRUD operations. Fix Error occured.Good error handling
project.paper4text2: App created with React.js React.state is used with state management
project.paper4text3: The project retrieves data from YTS.am, retrieves famous movie data from it and displays it in components.
project.paper4text4: The app is responsive using CSS and ready to be deployed.
project.paper4text5: [React-Redux] CRUD operations. Fix Error occured.Good error handling

footer.bottom: Copyright © Devrwoo Inc. All rights reserved.

landing.paper1text: 라이언은 올해 5월 초 부터 devrwoo를 개발하기 시작했습니다. 밤낮 가리지 않고 개발한 결과입니다. 프로그램을 만드는데 리액트, 리덕스, 익스프레스, 몽고디비, 그리고 노드제이에스를 사용했습니다...
landing.paper3text: 데이터의 연결과 보호의 균형을 위해 언제나 최선을 다 하겠습니다.
landing.grid2card1text: 사용자 인증까지 가능한 게시판입니다. 모든 유저는 글을 쓰고 그에 따른 댓글을 남길수 있으며 각자의 프로필까지 만들수있는 기능까지 있습니다. 또한, 자신의 Github 아이디를 입력하면 자신의 자료를 검색해줍니다.
landing.grid2card2text: 이 웹사이트를 개발한 소스코드는 아래 링크에서 확인하세요.

project.paper1text: 저는 이 도구들로 코딩합니다: -HTML -CSS -Javascript - Material UI -React.js -react-router-dom -react-redux -Redux -redux-thunk -Axios -Moment -proxy -Node.js -Express.js -express-validator -Mongoose -jsonWebToken -Bcrypt.js -config -Gravatar -Request and More..
